entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 7:32 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
